title: Drake (musician)
summary: Aubrey Drake Graham[4] (born October 24, 1986) is a Canadian rapper, singer and actor.[5] Gaining recognition by starring in the teen drama series Degrassi: The Next Generation (2001â€“08), Drake pursued a career in music releasing his debut mixtape Room for Improvement in 2006; he subsequently released the mixtapes Comeback Season (2007) and So Far Gone (2009) before signing with Young Money Entertainment.[6]
